titleStmt.title: A shock of corn coming in in its season. A sermon preached at the funeral of that ancient and eminent servant of Christ VVilliam Gouge, Doctor of Divinity, and late pastor of Black-Fryars, London, December the 16th, 1653. With the ample and deserved testimony that then was given of his life, by William Jenkyn (now) pastor of Black-Fryars, London.
titleStmt.author: Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.

titleStmt.title: A shock of corn coming in in its season.
